title: Now Available:  Two ATSI Bari Papers on ENEA Frascati Website
post:
Do you know “RGB-ITR scanner” ?
RGB-ITR is the acronym for Red Green Blue Imaging Topological Radar …
It’s based on double Amplitude Modulation Technique (190 MHz / 5MHz) …
Collects fuive information per pixel – three colors and two distances …
author: Piero

title: Now Available:  Two ATSI Bari Papers on ENEA Frascati Website
post:
Errata corrige:
five
and not
fuive
author: Piero

“Hostile critics will have an easy target, and perhaps they will think they are scoring against the Shroud, whereas they will only be hitting the errors of Dr. Hynek.”
nov. 4, 1951. Edward A. Wuenschel
Dr Hyneks are not an endangered species.
author: anoxie
